message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to let it go for $120.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand you're interested in the product, but $90 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm thinking $110. Would that work for you?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant at $110. Would you be willing to come down to $100?
I understand you're still a bit hesitant, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $105. This is my final offer, and I think it's a fair price considering the product's value. What do you think?
I appreciate your final offer, but I'm still not sure if $105 is the best deal for me. I'm willing to pay $98 for the product. Would you be willing to accept that?

I'm starting to think we're getting a bit too far apart, Bob. I'm willing to compromise again, but I need to make a living, so I'm thinking $105 is the minimum I can accept. I'm not willing to go any lower than that.
